name: Harborside Inn
description: Originally built in 1846 as a mercantile shipping warehouse on the Boston harbor, the Harborside Inn has been completely renovated to create a European style boutique hotel which features a hip cocktail lounge.Here, a "classic modernism" design is accented with the latest high technology amenities to satisfy the most savvy business or leisure traveler. Premier location. Exceptional value. European ambiance. The Harborside Inn combines it all to create a memorable lodging experience.All 200 guest rooms at The Harborside Inn are uniquely styled by custom designed to provide the ultimate combination of luxury, comfort, and functionality. From custom made furniture and Teak woodwork to imported Italian tile and nautical lighting fixtures, each room presents a soft modern motif with a residential feel.State-of-the-art amenities include free wireless internet with free 24 hour 1-800 technical support, stereo systems, DVD/CD players, HD televisions, voicemail, a movie library, individual climate control, and other custom appointments.Our highly trained staff will cater to your needs and provide genuine, warm, and intimate service that can only truly be provided at an independent owner-operated hotel. The Harborside Inn experience will make us your first choice when staying in Boston's Historic Waterfront neighborhood.iHotelier/iStay

Stay connected with AAA Four Diamond Amenities for personal success on the road, including full-service dining options, room service, a grab-and-go cafe, Fitness Center, indoor pool, Digital Check-in and Digital Key, and 24-hour guest assistance via text. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

description: Hampton Inn & Suites Boston Crosstown Center is ideally located adjacent to Boston Medical Center and close to Fenway Park, Northeastern University, the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, Newbury Street, the Hynes Convention Center, Longwood Medical Area and Boston's many universities, schools and attractions. Close to Logan International Airport, we are convenient to I-93 South, Exit 18 at 811 Massachusetts Avenue. The hotel is one mile from downtown Boston and close to the shops and restaurants of the Back Bay and South End. Also close by are The Museum of Fine Arts, Copley Place and Symphony Hall. name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Watertown
description: The Residence Inn is Watertown’s first all-suite hotel, across from Arsenal Yards and the Charles River, where Boston meets Cambridge. Our Watertown, MA, hotel boasts spacious studio, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Each suite includes a fully equipped kitchen ready for your favorite cuisine. Guests enjoy free internet, and a free breakfast is provided daily to start mornings off right. Our on-site 24-hour fitness center will keep your routine in check. Our hotel is minutes from Cambridge’s Harvard Square and Harvard University, Perkins School for the Blind, Commander’s Mansion, MIT, Arsenal Yards, Athenahealth Campus and downtown Boston. Our extended stay in Watertown, MA, is conveniently located only 9 miles from Boston's Logan Airport, and we offer paid parking for $28 per day per vehicle.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Express Boston
description: Welcome to the Newly Renovated Holiday Inn Express Boston! (located minutes from Downtown). Corporate and Academic travelers welcome us as a preferred hotel given our ideal location. The Hynes Convention Center, Boston Medical Center, University of Massachusetts, Tufts Medical Center, and the BCEC Convention Center are all located within just two (2) miles of our hotel. Having the added bonus of the Andrew T-station (metro) walking distance from the hotel, getting downtown is easiest as can be. Located just minutes from Downtown Boston, leisure travelers have all the access of Boston’s history, settled away in the South Bay Shopping Plaza; consisting of an AMC Movie Theater, and lots of Shops & Restaurants! Our hotel has the perfect location for any traveler looking to experience all the area has to offer. Boston Sports? Don’t worry – we’re near Fenway Park, and the TD Garden too. Whether you’re traveling on business, or pleasure, the Holiday Inn Express Boston provides the newly renewed Hot Buffet Breakfast Bar each morning, with favorites like bacon & eggs. Pairing this with a 24-hour fitness center, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, we ensure our guests get a great start, with resources & amenities to power you through the afternoon.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Boston Downtown
description: The DoubleTree by Hilton Boston-Downtown Hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Boston's vibrant Theater District, and welcomes each guest with the aroma of a full-service Starbucks and our signature warm chocolate chip cookie. Walk to fabulous performance venues, Boston Common, Boston's Public Garden, Tufts Medical Center and Floating Hospital for Children. Logan International Airport is a short 4.5 miles away from the hotel. The Tufts Medical Center subway "T" stop is steps from the entrance of the hotel and provides convenient access to all Boston has to offer. Once home to the prestigious Don Bosco High School, this hotel has a rich Boston history. Our beautiful, full service downtown hotel boasts oversized standard guest rooms, measuring over 300 sq. ft; along with elevated ceilings and large picture windows. Deluxe guest rooms and suites, many of which have lovely views of Downtown and Back Bay architecture, feature upgraded amenities, extra space and sofa beds, and are ideal for families. Enjoy tastes of New England at Wisteria Restaurant and Lobby Bar, offering a seasonal menu featuring signature local dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Our DoubleTree Hotel Boston-Downtown guests enjoy complimentary access to the adjoining state-of-the-art Wang YMCA health club, compete with fitness classes and Olympic-size pool. Our DoubleTree Hotel Boston-Downtown provides an ideal setting for small to medium-sized meetings, with over 2,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space and an accommodating, attentive staff. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Boston-Downtown Hotel, you're also surrounded by a world of cuisines in a variety of fine restaurants, and only moments from the boutiques, shops, and galleries of Newbury Street. Experience all of Boston when you stay at the DoubleTree Boston Hotel, in this premier downtown location. The friendliest hotel team in Boston looks forward to welcoming you and providing old-school hospitality during your stay with us.Hilton

description: Experience accommodations and a convenient location when staying at our hotel South Boston, right outside of downtown. Amenities include free WiFi, meeting space, a fitness center, restaurant and rooftop bar. Stylish guest rooms feature microwaves and refrigerators, separate work areas, flat-screen TVs, Keurig coffee makers and Bath and Body Works bath products. The new Cambria Hotel Boston, Downtown-South Boston is just steps away from shopping, dining and entertainment. You will also be near the Sports Museum, Copley Place, Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Skywalk Observatory, Boston Duck Tours, Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum, Lawn On D, Prudential Tower and the Hynes Convention Center. We are located near the US Army Department, Massachusetts General Hospital and several corporate offices. Get ready to enjoy friendly, professional service at our upscale hotel in Boston, MA. And do not forget that you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program. No pets allowed.Choice Hotels

description: Bostonians strolling historic brick-lined sidewalks in front of majestic brownstones, while sail boats glide nearby along the Charles River. Stay moments from top Boston attractions, including Newbury Street, Fenway Park, and directly connected to over 200 premier restaurants and shops at the Prudential Center and Copley Place Mall. Experience an expansive 24-hour fitness center, indoor pool, and a brand new exclusive M Club. Each of our reimagined hotel rooms and suites features sleek decor, platform beds, spa-like bathrooms, and remarkable city views. Satiate cravings with freshly-prepared meals delivered by A la Carte in-room dining, or catch a game on a big screen while dining at Yard House. Plan future meetings and social affairs at our Back Bay, Boston, MA hotel in 70,000 square feet of versatile event space, enhanced by expert planners and one of the largest ballrooms in New England.Marriott

name: Kimpton Marlowe Hotel
address: 25 Edwin H. Land Boulevard, Cambridge, MA 02141
description: An alluring courtyard with an interactive celestial sculpture welcomes guests to our inspiring Cambridge getaway on the Charles River. While Kimpton Marlowe Hotel emphasizes luxury and lavish style, it also links the intellectual and innovative spirit of Boston and Cambridge. Guests attend to the mind, body and soul in renovated guestrooms and suites that feature calming colors, locally-inspired artwork, custom furnishings and (often) sensational views; thoughtful amenities place a focus on staying fit, pampered and well-fed—thanks to Bambara Kitchen + Bar—while in our care.IHG Hotels & Resorts

Each room at The Windsor Inn features a private bathroom and a work desk. They are individually decorated with wood furnishings and soft neutral colors. Guests can use the communal kitchen area, which includes a stove, refrigerator, and a microwave, and the living area at the Cambridge Windsor Inn. The inn has air conditioning. The center of Boston is a 15 minute T ride away. Harvard University is 2 miles from the inn.

The hotel is also across the street from Somernova, a business park and innovation incubator. Walk to restaurants, cocktail lounges and breweries. Modern guestrooms offer plush bedding and spa inspired bathrooms with oversize showers and Bluetooth mirrors. Each room also features free WiFi and a flatscreen TV, as well as conveniences like a desk space, a refrigerator and a coffee maker.Choice Hotels

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Cambridge
description: Experience a refreshing getaway at the newly renovated Residence Inn Boston Cambridge. Relax and recharge in expansive apartment-style accommodations with fully equipped kitchens, separate living spaces and a thoughtful collection of modern amenities. Fuel up for a full day of business or sightseeing with a free breakfast buffet and stay active in our 24-hour fitness center featuring Peloton® Bikes and Matrix Fitness Equipment. Our hotel in Kendall Square, Cambridge, MA, is just one subway stop away from downtown Boston and close to many attractions including the Museum of Science, Fenway Park, Harvard University, MIT, TD Garden, Encore Boston Harbor and more. Host an intimate meeting in the boardroom or a larger gathering for up to 100 guests in the redesigned meeting space of our hotel near Boston, MA. With free Wi-Fi, a convenient hotel Market and new Theory Bar & Lounge offering cocktails and light fare, the Residence Inn Boston Cambridge has everything you need for a relaxing stay in a historic city.Marriott

description: Situated within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, The Verb Hotel provides guests with a convenient base while visiting Boston. name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Boston Somerville
description: Your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is HERE FOR YOU! Whether you are here for business or to take in the sights and sounds of the birthplace of American liberty, you can be assured your stay with us will be comfortable and enjoyable. Conveniently located off of I-93 and only two miles from downtown Boston, our hotel is located in the trendy Assembly Row area of Somerville. Boston's rich and colorful history is at your fingertips with convenient access to the MBTA (commonly referred to as the "T") located within walking distance of the hotel. Our complimentary shuttle service is available to transport you to and from Logan International Airport (contact hotel to schedule). Whether your adventure brings you to Boston, Somerville or Cambridge, you are guaranteed to be at the center of it all! Boston boasts a winning sports tradition with the Boston Red Sox at Fenway Park (5 mi) along with the Bruins and Celtics at TD Bank Garden (2 mi). If sightseeing is your game, Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is only a short "T" ride away. Within walking distance from the hotel, Assembly Row boasts a unique shopping, dining, and entertainment experience including SAKS 5th Avenue OFF FIFTH, Earl's Restaurant, AMC IMAX Theatre and LEGOLAND Discovery Center.Boston is known for higher education with Harvard, MIT and Tufts among the many major colleges and universities in the area. Business is a necessity, and be assured our location guarantees you can get the job done! The Boston and Hynes Convention Centers, Financial District, Cabot and Schrafts Office Parks and Mass General Hospital are easily accessible from our hotel. At your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville you will find friendly service, comfortable accommodations, and exceptional value. Our 147 spacious rooms and suites equipped with comfy pillow-top mattresses will provide a relaxing night's sleep. Wake up refreshed and energized with our Free Bright Side Breakfast including hot waffles, coffee, juice, breads, muffins, cereal, and fresh fruit. Unwind with a workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, enjoy free Wi-Fi, and take advantage of our onsite business center. Parking is included in your stay or leave the driving to us with our free shuttle to Boston Logan International Airport, the T, and Mass General Hospital (contact hotel to schedule). All rooms include a refrigerator, HD TV with complimentary Showtime, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, and free high-speed Wi-Fi.Whether it is work or leisure that brings you to the area, your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is READY FOR YOU! Let our warm hospitality, friendly staff and outstanding accommodations be the beginning to your Boston adventure!Free parking available to overnight guests only. Stay and Go packages are available that include extended parking for up to 7 days.Wyndham

We offer highly personalized service coupled with that old New England charm. Just minutes from historic Boston, Massachusetts, the Hampton Inn Boston/Cambridge hotel makes it easy for our guests to conduct business and still have time to explore the historic treasures of Boston and Cambridge, Massachusetts. Whether it's the city's high-energy nightlife, or a leisurely stroll along the Charles River, the Hampton Inn Boston/Cambridge has it all, and then some. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Boston/Cambridge hotel in Massachusetts!Hilton

Or in need of a place to relax after appointments at Mass General Hospital, Boston Children’s Hospital, Lahey Hospital, Beth Israel Deaconess or Brigham and Woman’s Hospital? Kennedy Memorial Park and the JFK School of Government, the hotel sits right in the center of this historic district. Cafes, shops, and restaurants galore around each corner, your options to explore are endless. Unwind as you take in those stunning city views. Grab your mat and exhale any worries away at the yoga studio, or become the pinball wizard at the game room. Escape the buzzing streets and admire the floral archways of the James P. Kelleher Rose Garden. Sip a beer at the Yard House or listen to the roar of the crowd echoing from Fenway Park. The Pierce Boston, the perfect getaway for every traveler (baseball fan or not). A space that works for you High-rises. Low-rises. Hidden neighborhoods and buzzing downtowns. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the St. Botolph Inn's lounge. Guests can use the modern fitness center or the on-site business center. Original art pieces are also included throughout the inn.

The guest house offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk. Newbury Guest House consists of 3 connected town houses. A designer boutique store is available on site and the Newbury Guest House features our on-site bakery, Patisserie On Newbury. Guest rooms at the Guest House on Newbury are equipped with 37-inch flat-screen TV and DVD players. Mini-refrigerators and safety deposit boxes are also included in each room. The Shops at Prudential Center and the Hynes Convention Center Subway Station are 5 minutes' walk from the Newbury Guest House in Boston. The Boston Common and Fenway Park are both 1 mi away.

There's a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers a business center for guest use. Popular points of interest near Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston include Boston South Station, Boston Public Garden and Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum. Select rooms include a sea view, private balcony, or sofa bed. A fitness center is available for guests to use at the Commercial Wharf Boston Yacht Haven. Laundry facilities are available as well. A free continental breakfast is served each morning. Various waterfront dining options, including the Chart House Restaurant and Joe's American Bar & Grill are within 5 minutes’ walk from the inn. The New England Aquarium is half a mile from the Yacht Haven. Boston Common is 1 mile away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Logan Airport

name: 2br Spacious & Comfy 43' Yacht - Heat & Ac - On The Freedom Trail - Best Nights Sleep
description: Unwind and watch the boats sail by on the Carpe Diem II. Be gently rocked to sleep in her two queen staterooms that comfortably sleeps four. Private heads (bathrooms) with showers accompany each stateroom. Enjoy a meal or mixup a cocktail on the aft deck while enjoying the sights and sounds of the harbor. Step inside to cool off or warm up with central A/C and Heat. Located in the historic Charlestown Navy Yard, you’re steps away from the Freedom Trail, North End and Downtown -The Space- Step aboard the Carpe Diem II and see her aft deck, welcoming you to sit, relax and start a great conversation. Move to the fly-bridge for a 360° view of the marina and harbor. Heading inside, her main salon offers comfortable seating for 6. A great spot to cozy up with a book after a fun day in the city. A Bluetooth speaker, Smart-TV and amble plugs for charging your devices add to livability of the boat. Step down to the galley and dinette, equipped with everything you need to make a meal onboard: a two burner induction cooktop, convection microwave/oven, toaster, small fridge and plenty of glasses, crockery, cutlery and pots and pans. Also, the cooking basics, salt, pepper, oil, sugar, tea, coffee, and a welcome bowl of snacks. The dinette table comfortably sits 4. Enter the private forward and aft staterooms made up with luxury linens, blankets, pillows & duvets. Grab a fluffy towel before entering one of two the two bathrooms. Equipped with quite and reliable heads (toilets) hot showers and shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Central A/C and Heat keep the boat comfortable no matter what the New England Weather throws at you. Located in the oldest neighborhood in Boston, Charlestown, the boat is close to many popular Boston destinations * 5 min walk to the USS Constitution * 10 min walk to the Bunker Hill Monument * 5 min walk to the Freedom Trail * 15 min walk to the North End (Ferry service available as well!) * 20 min walk Downtown and Faneuil Hall * 10 min walk to the TD Garden * 20 min Uber/Taxi to Fenway Park * 15 min Water Taxi ride to Seaport Logan Airport: 10-15 minute Uber/Lyft/Taxi Ride 20-30 minute Water Taxi Ride -Guest Access- While you do have access to the entire boat during your stay, the boat cannot leave the dock. Our insurance policy does not cover guests taking the boat out. If you would like to arrange for a boat tour of Boston during your stay, please ask, and we will put you in touch with the best charters in the area. -Common Questions- • Is there wifi on board? Yes! • Does the boat have A/C & Heat? The boat has both A/C and Heat! It is a boat, so there is minimal insulation but it stays comfy. Most guest prefer to keep the windows open for a nice sea breeze during the summer and cozy up in a sweatshirt during the cooler months. • Can we get picked up or dropped off at different wharves around the harbor? Yes! There are water taxis that can take you directly from the airport to the marina, and from the boat to anywhere else you may need to go. • Is there parking nearby? Yes – parking at the marina is available for $25/day (from May – October) or $10/day (November – April) along with other parking garages in the area. • Will there be enough room? The yacht is wonderfully comfortable! There's ample headroom in the cabin, and the beds just as large as queen-size beds you'd have at home. Please bear in mind that the boat is on water and it will move. While it's a gentle rock, If you're the kind of person who feels queasy just looking at boats, then this might not be the best option for you.VRBO

Continental breakfast is served daily, including fresh pastries, fruits, Greek yogurt, apple and orange juice, soy milk, variety of cereals, gourmet coffee, and regular and herbal tea. Guests can relax on the lovely outdoor porch. Other facilities offered include luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access. The bed and breakfast is 1.4 mi from Harvard University and 0.8 mi from Tufts University. Several dining options are located within walking distance.

name: Fun houseboat. Walk to Boston attractions WIFI
description: Experience Boston from the unique perspective of your own floating home! Nestled in a protected marina in Boston Harbor, our houseboat is fully equipped with all the comforts and amenities of home! The boat is fully air conditioned in the summer and heated during the winter. The covered front deck has a table and chairs and the sundeck above has outdoor seating. Free Wi-Fi is included in your rental. We are located in the Charlestown Marina. Accessible via water taxi, car, or taxi. Walk to the USS Constitution, Bunker Hill, TD Garden and the North End. MBTA water shuttle is a short walk. UBER readily available. Parking is available at $25 per day and must be reserved ahead or spaces can be full. Located in a very secure and gated marina, our houseboat is just minutes away from downtown Bostons' most popular attractions; Fanueil Hall/Quincy Market, the North End, the New England Aquarium, the Children's Museum and the Boston Convention Center. Our convenient location makes it easy for you reach points of interest. Please note we charge a $59 damage waiver that covers you for accidental damage up to $1500. Homeaway calls this an administrative fee. Rates differ per season. Put your dates in for the accurate quote. Travelling nurses please note. We rent our houseboats from November 1 to March 1 for $1500 per month plus electricity.Expedia

name: 'Travelers' Choice Award' Green Turtle I Houseboat in Boston Harbor!
description: What better way to see Boston than on a houseboat in the harbor with plenty of fresh air! Set in historic Boston Harbor in a protected state of the art gated and secure marina the Green Turtle I is the perfect choice for your visit. We are located in Boston's Charlestown Neighborhood which is home to the USS Constitution (Old Ironsides) and the Bunker Hill Monument. Charlestown is Boston's oldest neighborhood.There are wonderful restaurants within walking distance of the Green Turtle. The Green Turtle I is an award winning floating houseboat which has 2 separate suites which can accommodate 2 people in each suite. Each suite is very private. The price reflects one suite. We have been awarded The Travelers Choice and The Best of Boston Award. Set in historic Boston Harbor in a protected state of the art gated and secure marina the Green Turtle I is the perfect choice for your visit. We are located in Boston's Charlestown Neighborhood which is home to the USS Constitution (Old Ironsides) and the Bunker Hill Monument. Charlestown is Boston's oldest neighborhood. We are a short distance away from the North End, Fanueil Hall and the Boston Common. It is easy to get around by foot, ferry, free shuttle bus, Uber or Taxi. Catch the Green Line to get to a game at Fabulous Fenway Each suite has a kitchenette and a private bathroom en suite. The Green Turtle was designed for comfort above all and the only reminder your floating in Boston Harbor is the sound of the gulls, motion of the sea and reflection of the ocean dancing on the ceiling. Relax reclined on our dock chairs or sip gourmet coffee from the comfort of a well placed rattan chair. We provide luxury linens and towels. Your suite has a queen sized bed, small window table with rattan chairs and a kitchenette with a small refrigerator and microwave. We stock your suite with coffee, tea, cream, milk and water. If your dates are not available please check dates on sister suite listing #2752527 Come Float With Us!Expedia

name: Boston Harbor Yacht, Ac/Heat, Walk To North End Wifi
description: If you are planning a trip to Boston consider staying on our very comfortable motor yacht "Sea Pearl" in historic Charlestown on Boston Harbor. We are located in the new Charlestown Marina close to the USS Constitution, Freedom Trail and Bunker Hill monument. The North End is a very pleasant walk of less than 1 mile. Our 2003 Carver yacht is perfect for two couples with two staterooms ( bedrooms) each with a queen size bed and baths with showers. Additional sleeping is available in the full size pullout in the salon. Kitchen with microwave/confection oven, small refrigerator and freezer, and coffee maker. The yacht is fully air conditioned and heated during the winter. Stay connected with free WiFi. Two TVs with cable TV. Small outside seating on the stern of the boat and larger seating area up one level to the helm station. Please note the boat is stationary during your visit and can not be driven. Accessible to all of Boston via car, bus, and water taxi. Walk to many area restaurants, Freedom Trail, Bunker Hill, USS Constitution and the North End. Parking is available at $25 per day and must be reserved ahead or spaces can be full. Free bus to the North End two blocks away, MBTA Water shuttle is less than 10 minute walk and the shuttle drops you off at Long Wharf right next to the New England Aquarium Safe and friendly neighborhood. Gated entrance to the marina. Please note, stairs can be challenging to anyone with mobility issues. Please check photos. Our yacht provides a exciting unique remedy for a busy vacation. Wake to the sound of gulls. Have your coffee while watching the sun come up over the harbor. Spend a busy day seeing the sites and return to quiet on the water. Sip a cocktail outside of the deck watching the harbor and finally be rocked to sleep at night in our comfortable beds done up in premium linens. Please note. During the winter months ( November to April) the yacht will be covered in shrink wrap to help keep the boat warm. This does impact views out of windows. Boat position within the marina can change and may not appear the same as the photos.Expedia

name: 'Travelers Choice Award' Spacious 2 bedrm 45 ft yacht close to the Freedom Trail
description: What better way to spend time in Boston during this time than on your own private yacht. Come social distance on your own private yacht! Your yacht will be cleaned and disinfected in between stays. All linens are changed and disinfected between stays. The Green Turtle II is a 45 foot motor yacht. Set in the historic Boston/Charlestown Navy Yard in Boston Harbor, the Green Turtle II offers an expansive view of Boston. The Green Turtle II is permanently docked at a protected marina during your stay. The USS Constitution, Bunker Hill Monument and the Freedom Trail are just a short walk away. Take the free bus shuttle to North Station(.07 miles away) to the subway to any of the sites. Enjoy the privacy of your own yacht. The Green Turtle was designed for comfort above all and the only reminder you are floating in Boston Harbor is the sound of the gulls, motion of the sea and reflection of the ocean dancing on the ceiling. Enjoy the outdoors on the comfortable aft deck watching the harbor traffic. The Green Turtle II can accommodate 2-6 people. She has 2 queen staterooms and the salon has a sleeper sofa for 2 along with comfortable seating. There is a dinette and galley along with a fantastic aft deck with comfortable outdoor seating area with spectacular views. She is heated and air conditioned. We will meet you on the pier and bring you to the boat and orient you to the boat and how to get around. We will also make recommendations. Come Float With US!Expedia
